蘭.definition: orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii); fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei); lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

蘭交.definition: close friendship; a meeting of minds

蘭克.definition: Rank (name); Leopold von Ranke (1795-1886), important German historian

蘭因絮果.definition: starts well but ends in separation (of marital relations)

蘭坪.definition: Lanping Bai and Pumi autonomous county in Nujiang Lisu autonomous prefecture 怒江傈僳族自治州[Nu4 jiang1 Li4 su4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1] in northwest Yunnan

蘭坪縣.definition: Lanping Bai and Pumi autonomous county in Nujiang Lisu autonomous prefecture 怒江傈僳族自治州[Nu4 jiang1 Li4 su4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1] in northwest Yunnan

蘭學.definition: Dutch studies (study of Europe and the world in premodern Japan)

蘭山區.definition: Lanshan district of Linyi city 臨沂市|临沂市[Lin2 yi2 shi4], Shandong

蘭州.definition: see 蘭州市|兰州市[Lan2zhou1 Shi4]

蘭州市.definition: Lanzhou, prefecture-level city and capital of Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1su4 Sheng3]

蘭摧玉折.definition: premature death of a budding talent; those whom the Gods love die young

蘭溪.definition: see 蘭溪市|兰溪市[Lan2xi1 Shi4]

蘭溪市.definition: Lanxi, county-level city in Jinhua 金華市|金华市[Jin1hua2 Shi4], Zhejiang

蘭章.definition: a beautiful speech or piece of writing; your beautiful article (honorific)

蘭考縣.definition: Lankao county in Kaifeng 開封|开封[Kai1 feng1], Henan

蘭舟.definition: lit. boat made of lily magnolia wood; poetic term for boat

蘭艾同焚.definition: lit. to burn both fragrant orchids and stinking weeds (idiom); fig. to destroy indiscriminately the noble and common; the rain falls on the just and unjust alike

蘭花指.definition: hand gesture in traditional dances (joined thumb and middle finger, the rest extended)

蘭若.definition: Buddhist temple (transliteration of Sanskrit "Aranyakah") (abbr. for 阿蘭若|阿兰若[a1 lan2 re3])

蘭西.definition: Langxi county in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang

蘭西縣.definition: Langxi county in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang

蘭譜.definition: lit. directory of orchids; fig. genealogical record (esp. exchanged between sworn brothers)

蘭陵.definition: Lanling County in Linyi 臨沂|临沂[Lin2 yi2], Shandong

蘭陵笑笑生.definition: Lanling Xiaoxiaosheng, pseudonym of the Ming dynasty writer and author of the Golden Lotus 金瓶梅[Jin1 ping2 mei2]

蘭陵縣.definition: Lanling County in Linyi 臨沂|临沂[Lin2 yi2], Shandong

蘭麝.definition: lit. orchids and musk; fig. sweet perfumes
